xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description:
This modules defines a set of functions for managing indexes that are declared in the prolog of a module.
This module is part of Zorba's XQuery Data Definition Facility. All the indexes managed by this module have to be pre-declared in the prolog of a module. Please refer to the general documentation for more information and examples.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Nicolae Brinza, Matthias Brantner, David Graf, Till Westmann, Markos Zaharioudakis

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: A sequence of QNames, one for each available index, or an empty sequence if none are.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: iddl:available-indexes
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function iddl:available-indexes() as xs:QName* external

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $name The name of the index to create.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: An empty XDM instance and a pending update list that, once applied, creates the index with the given name.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:error: zerr:ZDDY0021 if $name is not equal to the name of any resource in the statically known indexes.
zerr:ZDDY0022 if an index with $name already exists.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: iddl:create
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare updating function iddl:create($name as xs:QName) external

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Gets a sequence of QNames representing the indexes that have been declared in the prolog of the static context.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: A sequence of QNames, one for each created collection, or an emtpy sequence.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: iddl:declared-indexes
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function iddl:declared-indexes() as xs:QName* external

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $name The name of the index to delete.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: An empty XDM instance and a pending update list that, once applied, deletes the index with the given name.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:error: zerr:ZDDY0009 if the index does not exist.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: iddl:delete
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare updating function iddl:delete($name as xs:QName) external

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $name The name of the index that is being checked.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: true if the index is available; false otherwise.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: iddl:is-available-index
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function iddl:is-available-index($name as xs:QName) as xs:boolean external

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Gets whether an index has been declared in the prolog of the static context.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $name The name of the index that is being checked.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: true if the index was declared; false otherwise.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: iddl:is-declared-index
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function iddl:is-declared-index($name as xs:QName) as xs:boolean external
